general.name: Fabian Silva
general.headline: Computer Engineer, Software Developer.
about: Hello, I am a software developer and data analyst with over 4 years of experience.

Throughout my career, I have worked on various projects in both academic and professional settings, allowing me to develop skills in software development, data analysis, and database design, among others.
I am passionate about continuous learning and enjoy taking on new challenges. I always strive to improve my skills and expand my knowledge to provide efficient and innovative solutions.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: General supervisor of the software development/maintenance team.

experiences.title: Junior Developer
experiences.description: Member of the software development team. Developed middlewares, routing, and security methods.

experiences.title: Data Analyst, Software Developer
experiences.description: Development of an administrative program for a clinical laboratory. Migration and updating of databases, credentials, and statistics.

education.subject: Computer Engineering
education.description: Computer Engineering, learning programming languages, software development, data analysis, and database design. I also gained knowledge in networking and cybersecurity, as well as electronics and control.

education.subject: U.E.P. CONOPAIMA
education.description: Basic knowledge of mathematics, biology, physics, chemistry, history, geography, and English.

volunteering.description: Assigned to teach a free course to nearby communities on office automation, Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.
